What is VXN?



VXN (formerly know as Vixen Workout) is a Dance brand focused on improving the physical & mental wellness of women. Our classes recreate the live stage experience by incorporating trending choreography, musical remixes, and atmosphere lighting. As a result, participants are able to feel like performers. The class experience promotes Mind-Body connection, emotional release, and community in addition to physical fitness.

The vision and values of VXN

Frequently Asked Questions

Any woman 18 years or older may take the VXN Online Certification Program.

No worries, many of our successful VXN Certified Instructors were former clients who did not have any teaching experience. We provide you with everything you need to become a successful Certified Instructor without prior experience.

Once you have registered and paid for the course, you will receive an email with a direct link to access the entire course.

Our standard rate is $299, but you are now able to become certified online at the price of $199.

TBD

TBD

The fee covers your entire online program, if you do not receive a certification there are no refunds.

TBD

VXN has a couple of areas that are off limits at this time: South Florida (Miami-Dade County) and New York borough of Manhattan are off limits. Only VXN LLC, employed Master Trainers can teach in these areas. All other areas are open for you to teach.

After completing the Vixen Workout Certification Training, you can begin teaching whenever you feel comfortable and ready with the Vixen Workout Phase 1 combinations. Every instructor is an independent contractor, which gives you the freedom to set your own schedule, rates, terms, agreements, etc. at any facility you choose.

TBD

Any questions can be directed to certifications@vixenworkout.com
